title: can't log to chat service
body:
HELP! 
i cant connect to chat service
tried relog changing date

wont work 

* pls help me or fix it rito

replies.body: This is currently a known issue, and a fix is being worked on!  We'll be providing updates on our [service status ](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#euw)page.  Hang tight!
